definition: Gorkii (name)/Maxim Gorkii (1868-1936), Russian proletarian writer and propagandist

pinyin: Gao1 er3 ji1 fu4 he2 ti3

sentences.english: Golgi to school, only to pick up trash money.
sentences.chinese: 高爾基爲了上學，只得去撿垃圾換錢。

sentences.english: The characteristics of tetrad was that the nucleus and Golgi bodies being in the active state.
sentences.chinese: 四分孢子的顯著特徵是細胞核和高爾基體呈活躍狀態。

sentences.english: The constitution of golgi apparatus degenerated gradually follow growth and development.
sentences.chinese: 高爾基體隨着細胞的發育有退化趨勢。

sentences.english: But this summer the “wind of change” has again come to Gorky Park.
sentences.chinese: 但是今年夏天“改變之風”再次降臨高爾基公園。
在此地，在高爾基公園裏。

sentences.english: A sailor poses with his girlfriend during Sailors' Day in Moscow's Gorky Park. (1993)
sentences.chinese: 莫斯科的高爾基公園，一個水手與他的女朋友合照。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, dictyosome secreted vesicles into the vacuoles.
sentences.chinese: 同時，高爾基體分泌小泡進入液泡。

sentences.english: WHAT is a Golgi apparatus used for?
sentences.chinese: 高爾基體的作用是什麼？

sentences.english: Ultrastructural study on dictyosome and its vesicle secretion during development of floral nectary of arabidopsis thaliana l.
sentences.chinese: 擬南芥花蜜腺的高爾基體活動及其分泌途徑。

sentences.english: Many little transport vesicles show in white, surround the Golgi apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 白色的是圍繞在高爾基體周圍的衆多微小的轉運囊泡。

sentences.english: At the end stage of vitellogenesis, Golgi complex began to disintegrate, so its number decreased.
sentences.chinese: 卵黃髮生後期，高爾基複合體開始解體，數量減少。

sentences.english: The first Russian revolution. Writer Maxim Gorky prods opera singer Feodor Chaliapin with a broom, 1905.
sentences.chinese: 1905年革命後，高爾基和歌劇演員沙里亞賓。

sentences.english: This book is the author of Gorky.
sentences.chinese: 這部書的作者是高爾基。

sentences.english: Here, the vesicles merge to form a golgi cisterna with the proteins located inside the cisterna 's membrane.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，囊泡合併組建高爾基池與蛋白質位於內池膜。

definition: to have been through the hardships of life/to have been through the mill
drinking party/to go on a binge/to paint the town red
lit. single spear and horse (idiom); fig. single-handed/unaccompanied
to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
Mt Babao in Haidian district of Beijing
tone sandhi/modified tone/(music) to change key/modulation
War and Peace by Tolstoy 托爾斯泰|托尔斯泰
to die/euphemism, lit. to return West or to the Western Paradise
light-years (apart)/a million miles (apart)/(i.e. indicates a huge difference or a huge distance)
a falling leaf returns to the roots (idiom); everything has its ancestral home/In old age, an expatriate longs to return home.
